alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brazoria; Inland Brazoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 3:16PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Brazoria County through 345 PM CDT... At 315 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a slow moving strong thunderstorm over Hillcrest, or near Alvin, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Locally heavy rainfall and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alvin, northern Angleton, southern Manvel, Danbury, Iowa Colony, Hillcrest, Liverpool, Bonney and Chocolate Bayou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in League City.
